roleset.name: move with great intensity

example.name: I think this is consistent with other movement verbs
example.text: `` Jon Peters will come barreling into a room, say he's got a great idea, and be gone.

roleset.note: BARREL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'barrel' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from barrel.01-v predicate notes)
